attributes.action: Prioritise partner visa applications awaiting decision more than 12 weeks
attributes.additional_details: This is causing great anxiety and we are all mentally drained from the stress. Most of us are away from our partners which is causing unnecessary pressure on our relationships. It is not fair at all that we have all paid for this visa expecting that it would be finalised in 12 weeks. We have contacted our local MP and the UKVI tell them that the application is still under consideration. We contact the UKVI through paid emails and calls but they give us no information apart from that we have to wait.
attributes.background: We want the Government to prioritise visa applications of those who have waited more than 12 weeks for a partner visa so they receive a decision as soon as possible. We have been waiting over the 12 weeks timeframe which is stated on the Government's website.
